name:  tz martin
body:
![avatar](https://avatars0.githubusercontent.com/u/139472?v=3&s=220)

My name is Terry Martin.  I'm a hacker, designer and coder.  Professionally, I’m the founder of [Semantic Press](http://www.semanticpress.com), a developer of mobile app and middleware solutions.  I typically work with larger companies to help ramp up teams on mobile and cloud projects.  I also invest in startups, build apps and help them raise capital.

I'm a relentless problem solver with a design mind.

## How To Reach Me

Here are the best ways to reach me (order of priority):

Method | Lead Time
----------------- | --------
[SMS](tel:2025698497) | 0 - 1 hour 
[Phone](tel:2025698497) | 0 - 6 hours
[Twitter](https://twitter.com/tzmartin) / [FB](https://www.facebook.com/tzmartin) / [WeChat](https://drive.google.com/file/d/0B-xerUji29pDa0MxTGptd09wWmM/view?usp=sharing) | 0 - 6 hours 
[Email](mailto:terryzmartin@gmail.com) | 0 - 48 hours 
Letter | 7 days 
Door | why?
